corrected_solution:
On Sunday he takes 2 hours to get there because 4 / 2 = 2
This takes him 120 minutes because 2 x 60 = 120
On Tuesday and Thursday, it takes him .4 hours to get to the store because 4 / 10 = .4
On Tuesday and Thursday, it takes him 24 minutes to get to the store because .4 x 60 = 24
In total it takes him 168 minutes to get to the store because 120 + 24 + 24 = 168
On average it takes him 56 minutes because 168 / 3 = 56
#### 56
corrected_explanation: The operator in step 2 encounters an error, multiplication should be used instead of addition. It miscalculates 2+60=62 instead of 2*60=120. This affects steps 5 and 6. Step 5 incorrectly calculates 62+24+24=110 instead of 120+24+24=168. Step 6 miscalculates 110/3=36.6 instead of 168/3=56.

corrected_solution:
On Sunday he takes 2 hours to get there because 4 / 2 = 2
This takes him 120 minutes because 2 x 60 = 120
On Tuesday and Thursday, it takes him .4 hours to get to the store because 4 / 10 = .4
On Tuesday and Thursday, it takes him 24 minutes to get to the store because .4 x 60 = 24
In total it takes him 168 minutes to get to the store because 120 + 24 + 24 = 168
On average it takes him 56 minutes because 168 / 3 = 56
#### 56
corrected_explanation: The operator in step 6 encounters an error and should use division instead of subtraction. It miscalculates 168-3=165 instead of 168/3=56, resulting in the final erroneous result.
